Name: OLI_EMAIL_AGENTCSE
Definition: Carrier's email address agent will use for customer service.

Name: OLI_EMAIL_CLIENTCSE
Definition: Carrier's email address client will use for customer service.

Name: OLI_EMAIL_PREVIOUS
Definition: "Previous" where type (Personal, Business, etc.) is unknown or not applicable

Name: OLI_EMAIL_PRIMARY
Definition: An email address that has been designated as the primary address for email contact.

Name: OLI_EMAIL_ALTERNATE
Definition: An email address that has been designated as the secondary or alternate address for email contact.
